## Post On Screen - Display text on your screens

![Screenshot of Post On Screen](https://www.japplis.com/post-on-screen/images/post-on-screen-screenshot.png)

Display text on top of your other windows. 
        Select the text, font, size, color or gradient. 
        Define the speed to rotate the gradient colors.
        Define the transparency of the text.
